content: - designed by juan the yarn addict materials medium 4-weight yarn 6 0 mm j hook scissors darning needle abbreviations chain chain double_crochet double_crochet directions chain 26 small - child size chain 30 medium - adult chain 34 large -adult round 1 insert 1 double_crochet in the 4th chain from the hook and in every chain until the last chain the three skipped chains count as a double_crochet in the last chain insert 3 double_crochet insert 1 double_crochet in each chain on the opposite side of the double_crochet already created until the last chain in the last chain insert 2 double_crochet and slip_stitch to the top chain to close the round round 2 chain 3 counts as a double_crochet insert 1 double_crochet in each stitch until the end of the round slip to the top chain of the chain 3 to close the round repeat round 2 as follows below per the size you re making small child size 19 additional rounds for a total of 21 total rounds 8 ½ inches wide x 10 ½ inches long medium adult size - 22 additional rounds for a total of 24 total rounds 9 ½ inches wide x 11 ½ inches long large adult size - 25 additional rounds for a total of 27 total rounds 10 ½ inches wide x 12 ½ inches long tie off and sew in ends enjoy *notes 1 measurements are approximate and will vary due to gauge from person to person 2 feel free to reduce the amount of rounds if a smaller brim is desired copyright notice copyright © 2025 by juan the yarn addict jtya designs llc all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only it may not be reproduced distributed or sold without the express written permission of the designer finished items made from this pattern may be sold but please credit the designer social media juantheyarnaddict juantheyarnaddict juantheyarnaddict juan the yarn addict and friends
